meanings.definition: Mangs (noun): A slang term for a group of friends or associates.
meanings.sent1: After school, my mangs and I always play basketball together.
meanings.sent2: She invited her mangs over for a movie night.
meanings.sent3: The mangs decided to have a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: The mangs stuck together like glue during the school trip.
meanings.sent5: Their friendship was so strong, they were like a pack of mangs.

meanings.definition: Mangs (verb): To hang out or spend time with a group of friends.
meanings.sent1: Let's mangs at the park this weekend.
meanings.sent2: They love to mangs at the beach on sunny days.
meanings.sent3: We mangs at the mall and ended up buying too much.
meanings.sent4: She always mangs with her cousins during the holidays.
meanings.sent5: Manging with them always brings a smile to my face.

meanings.definition: Mangs (adjective): Used to describe something cool or impressive.
meanings.sent1: That skateboard trick was so mangs!
meanings.sent2: Her new phone case is really mangs.
meanings.sent3: He thought his dance moves were the most mangs of all.
meanings.sent4: The mangs car in the parking lot caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in the most mangs colors.
